statements: SELECT * FROM player_sessions;
SELECT player_id, login_timestamp, logout_timestamp FROM player_sessions ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, login_timestamp, logout_timestamp FROM player_sessions WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, login_timestamp FROM player_sessions WHERE login_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(login_timestamp) AS latest_login FROM player_sessions;
SELECT * FROM player_sessions WHERE player_id = 100 ORDER BY login_timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, login_timestamp FROM player_sessions WHERE login_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND logout_timestamp IS NULL;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS session_count FROM player_sessions GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY session_count DESC;
SELECT player_id, MIN(login_timestamp) AS first_login, MAX(logout_timestamp) AS last_logout FROM player_sessions GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, DATEDIFF(logout_timestamp, login_timestamp) AS session_duration FROM player_sessions WHERE logout_timestamp IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM player_logins;
SELECT player_id, login_timestamp FROM player_logins ORDER BY login_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM gameplay_sessions WHERE player_id = 100;
SELECT session_id, start_time, end_time FROM gameplay_sessions WHERE start_time >= '2022-01-01' AND end_time <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_sessions FROM gameplay_sessions GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_sessions >= 5;
SELECT * FROM player_logins WHERE player_id = 1 ORDER BY login_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS login_count FROM player_logins GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT player_id, AVG(DATEDIFF(end_time, start_time)) AS avg_session_duration FROM gameplay_sessions GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY avg_session_duration DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_id, MIN(login_timestamp) AS first_login FROM player_logins GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, MAX(end_time) AS last_session_end_time FROM gameplay_sessions GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY last_session_end_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM player_logins
SELECT player_id, login_time FROM player_logins ORDER BY login_time DESC
SELECT session_id, player_id, start_time, end_time FROM gameplay_sessions WHERE player_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc'
SELECT player_id, COUNT(session_id) AS session_count FROM gameplay_sessions GROUP BY player_id HAVING session_count > 3
SELECT player_id, SUM(score) AS total_score FROM player_scores GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY total_score DESC
SELECT player_id, login_time FROM player_logins WHERE player_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678'
SELECT * FROM gameplay_sessions ORDER BY start_time DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT player_id, MAX(score) AS highest_score FROM player_scores GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY highest_score DESC
SELECT player_id, COUNT(session_id) AS session_count FROM gameplay_sessions GROUP BY player_id HAVING session_count >= 3
SELECT player_id, AVG(score) AS avg_score FROM player_scores GROUP BY player_id
SELECT * FROM player_logins ORDER BY login_timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, username FROM player_details WHERE player_id = 123;
SELECT session_id, player_id, MAX(score) AS max_score FROM gameplay_scores GROUP BY session_id;
SELECT player_id, email FROM player_details WHERE username LIKE 'j%';
SELECT * FROM gameplay_sessions WHERE player_id = 456 ORDER BY start_timestamp ASC;
SELECT player_id, login_timestamp FROM player_logins WHERE player_id = 123 ORDER BY login_timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, start_timestamp, end_timestamp FROM gameplay_sessions WHERE session_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND player_id = 456 ORDER BY start_timestamp ASC;
SELECT player_id, score FROM gameplay_scores WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_id, username, email FROM player_details WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT player_id, username, email FROM player_details WHERE username = 'john_doe' OR username = 'jane_smith';
SELECT * FROM player_stats;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player_info WHERE player_id = 123;
SELECT reward_name, reward_timestamp FROM player_rewards ORDER BY reward_timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, games_played, total_score FROM player_stats WHERE games_played > 10 ORDER BY total_score DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, email FROM player_info WHERE email LIKE '%@domain.com%' ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_info WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, email FROM player_info WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT player_name, games_played FROM player_info JOIN player_stats ON player_info.player_id = player_stats.player_id;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(session_id) AS session_count FROM gameplay_session_timestamps GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_name, reward_name, reward_timestamp FROM player_info JOIN player_rewards ON player_info.player_id = player_rewards.player_id;
